newsitem.title: USA: Health Systems Design names Harris CEO.
newsitem.headline: Health Systems Design names Harris CEO.

text.p: Health Systems Design Corp said Tuesday that Russell Harrison has been named president and chief executive, effective August 4.
Richard Auger is relinquishing the title of chief executive but will remain chairman and assume the added role of director of product research.
Catherine Roth, who is now president, will become executive director of new business development, the company said.

Before joining Health Systems Design, Harrison was vice president and chief information officer with a Paris-based company known as SITA GlobeTel Co. Before SITA, he was chairman and chief executive of 3Net Systems, a provider of client/server solutions to the healthcare industry, Health Systems said.
Auger and Roth co-founded Health Systems in 1988. The company provides core managed care information systems to health care payers and providers.
